value.name: Top Speed (Forward)
value.info: Maximum forward speed of this vehicle

value.name: Top Speed (Reverse)
value.info: Maximum reverse speed of this vehicle

value.name: Acceleration
value.info: Rate of increase from zero to maximum speed

value.name: Deceleration
value.info: Rate of decrease from maximum speed to zero

value.name: Left Turn Angle
value.info: Maximum turning angle to the left (for wheeled vehicles only)

value.name: Right Turn Angle
value.info: This value is always negative, since its turning the opposite direction as left turn

value.name: Wheel Blur
value.info: Rate at which the engine changes from the slow wheel texture to the fast wheel texture

bitmask.name: Third Person Entrance
bitmask.info: Changes to 3rd person perspective while entering this seat

bitmask.name: Uses MC Weapons
bitmask.info: MC can fire his own weapons from this seat

bitmask.name: Fires Weapon
bitmask.info: Player in this seat controls the vehicles weapon(s)

bitmask.name: Drives Vehicle
bitmask.info: Player in this seat controls the vehicles movement

bitmask.name: MC Invisible
bitmask.info: MC will become invisible while using this seat

value.name: Lower HUD Limit
value.info: How low the reticle is able to aim

value.name: Upper HUD Limit
value.info: How high the reticle is able to aim
